system.effect: Trigger - An adjacent Ally is hit by an attack\nThe user and triggering Ally switch places, and the user becomes the target of the triggering attack instead, taking damage from the attack as if resisted one step further. If switching places would not move the triggering Aly out of the area-of-effect of a Burst, Blast, Cone, or Line, this Ability does not prevent the ally from being hit. Defensive.
